flag.name: wxDIRCTRL_DIR_ONLY
flag.description: Only show directories, and not files.

flag.name: wxDIRCTRL_SELECT_FIRST
flag.description: When setting the default path, select the first file in the directory.

flag.name: wxDIRCTRL_EDIT_LABELS
flag.description: Allow the folder and file labels to be editable.

flag.name: wxDIRCTRL_MULTIPLE
flag.description: Allows multiple files and folders to be selected.

text.name: Filter
text.description: Filter string, using the same syntax as used by wxFileDialog, e.g. "All files (*.*)|*.*|JPEG files (*.jpg)|*.jpg" (default: empty).

bool.name: Show hidden
bool.description: If true, hidden folders and files will be displayed by the control. If false, they will not be displayed.
